competition_entries.title: Bidirectional Text Attack with Authority Scaffolding
competition_entries.attack_description: Novel combination of Unicode bidirectional text controls with multi-stage authority escalation scaffolding bypasses instruction following safeguards.

competition_entries.attack_description: ZWJ characters combined with incremental trust-building conversation patterns systematically bypass safety guidelines through context manipulation.

competition_entries.title: Visual Spoofing with Plausible Deniability Framework
